question: The Maternity (Amendment) Bill 2017 became an Act in which year?
explanation: The Maternity (Amendment) Bill 2017 which was an amendment to the Maternity Benefit Act of 1961 received an assent from President of India on March 27, 2017. The Act of 1961 protects the employment of women during the time of her maternity and entitles her of a ‘maternity benefit’.
